amendment.description: Amendment establishes authority for a court to consider the extent of any harm to national security.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Conyers.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
